description: Enterprise techniques used by Gelsemium, ATT&CK group G0141 v1.0
name: Gelsemium (G0141)

techniques.comment: [Gelsemium](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0141) has established infrastructure through renting servers at multiple providers worldwide.(Citation: ESET Gelsemium June 2021)
[Gelsemium](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0141) has used dynamic DNS in its C2 infrastructure.(Citation: ESET Gelsemium June 2021)
[Gelsemium](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0141) has compromised software supply chains to gain access to victims.(Citation: ESET Gelsemium June 2021)
